$WmMPID_ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Normal,Face|The Battle of the Eagle and Lion is
set to begin at long last.$k$pEveryone, show off the results of
your dedicated training!$k$p$WmMPID_クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Normal,Face|Remember, we're not just fighting
for honor. There's a prize at stake!$k$p$WmMPID_エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_Normal,Face|It's almost time to begin. Steel
yourselves, everyone.$k$p
